input_text:
Job Title: Flex Order Selector

Location: York, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
UNFI has high paying jobs with fulfilling work available NOW that allow you to build your own schedule after two weeks of training.

Join our team and immediately become part of the largest distributor of conventional, natural, organic and specialty products in the United States and Canada. We serve over 43,000 customer locations with 200,000 different products. Our Warehouse associates supply thousands of consumers with better for you food that nourishes families nationwide. Our retailers range from small family-owned stores to Wholefoods Markets and everything in between. Are you ready to make an impact on the lives of others and feel good about what you do? Join our growing Distribution team today.

Must be able to work Monday-Friday for first two weeks of training.

Job Overview:

$20.75 + Rate Incentives Weekly pay checksYou pick your schedule based on open shifts during the day timeSet start and end timesGrowth and professional development opportunitiesRecognition for great work, company events and picnics, and much more

Job Responsibilities:

Selects a variety of product utilizing a Vocollect HeadsetTransports products safety through the warehouse on electric pallet jacksMaintains order selection performance and standards of speed and accuracy with minimum damageEnsures the labels and pallets are accurateBuild stable and well cubed palletsMaintains a positive attitude and sense of teamworkAssists other departments with work activities as neededBuilds strong relationships within the warehouse to promote safe and respectful working environment

Position Requirements:

Previous Warehouse/Selecting experience required.Must be able to work Monday-Friday for first two weeks of training. 

Physical Requirements:

Lifting objects weighing up to 100 lbs. consistentlyOccasionally pushing, sitting, touching, reaching, climbing, pulling, and gripping

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. UNFI is an Equal Opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive and respectful environment for all. - M/F/Veteran/Disability. VEVRAA Federal Contractor.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Flex Order Selector
output_json.summary: UNFI is seeking a Flex Order Selector with previous Warehouse/Selecting experience.

Transports products safety through the warehouse on electric pallet jacks
Maintains order selection performance and standards of speed and accuracy with minimum damage
Ensures the labels and pallets are accurate
Builds stable and well cubed pallets
Maintains a positive attitude and sense of teamwork
Assists other departments with work activities as needed
Builds strong relationships within the warehouse to promote safe and respectful working environment
